name: Blocks (Anubhav Kashyap)
description:
BLOCKS Controls: 
W, A, D and Space or Arrow Keys 
F: Fullscreen Mode

Blocks is a fun platformer, in which you have to try and survive for as long as you can, as you slowly run out of space!

Made in 5 hours for the 42nd Ludum Dare game jam by Anubhav Kashyap, a 14 year old developer.
